alert.name: Alert
alert.desc: Draw 2 additional cards at the start of every battle and negotiation.

ancient_warrior.name: Ancient Warrior
ancient_warrior.desc: The first 2 cards you draft in each deck come with full xp.

animal_bond.name: Animal Bond
animal_bond.desc: Eating food also restores the health of your pet.

barbarous.name: Barbarous
barbarous.desc: There are no repercussions for murder.

bare_mettle.name: Bare Mettle
bare_mettle.desc: Mettle Upgrades do not apply, and you gain no mettle!

basic_training.name: Basic Training
basic_training.desc: The max XP on both your basic decks is halved.

battle_bundle.name: Battle Bundle
battle_bundle.desc: Draft 3 packs of battle cards to augment your starting deck, then remove 3 cards from your deck.

benefits.name: Benefits
benefits.desc: At the start of the game, 1 random person will like you.

benefits_ii.name: Benefits II
benefits_ii.desc: At the start of the game, 2 random people will like you.

benefits_iii.name: Benefits III
benefits_iii.desc: At the start of the game, 3 random people will like you.

brilliance.name: Brilliance
brilliance.desc: The max XP of all cards and grafts is reduced by 50%.

charisma.name: Charisma
charisma.desc: Draft a starting negotiation deck of 10 cards.

charming.name: Charming
charming.desc: At the start of each day, a random person that likes you will love you instead.

contaminated_equipment.name: Contaminated Equipment
contaminated_equipment.desc: Whenever you install a graft, gain Exhaustion and Mental Block.

cosmic_interference.name: Cosmic Interference
cosmic_interference.desc: At the start of the game, draft two Cosmic Grafts, one of each type.

reduced_boss_health.name: Reduced Boss Health
reduced_boss_health.desc: All bosses have less maximum health.

elimination.name: Elimination
elimination.desc: Removing cards at shops can be done any number of times.

fast_learner.name: Fast Learner
fast_learner.desc: Lower the max XP of all non-basic cards by 2.

first_impressions.name: First Impressions
first_impressions.desc: Receive a random relationship each time you meet someone for the first time.

forgiveness.name: Forgiveness
forgiveness.desc: At the start of each day, a random person that hates you will dislike you instead.

giant_mechs.name: Giant Mechs
giant_mechs.desc: Mechs are bigger, have more health, and do more damage.

gourmet.name: Gourmet
gourmet.desc: Eating heals 8 bonus health and drinking restores 6 extra resolve.

havarian_mulligan_(battle).name: Havarian Mulligan (Battle)
havarian_mulligan_(battle).desc: Draft two sets of 5 cards each for your starting battle deck.

havarian_mulligan_(negotiation).name: Havarian Mulligan (Negotiation)
havarian_mulligan_(negotiation).desc: Draft two sets of 5 cards each for your starting negotiation deck.

insomnia.name: Insomnia
insomnia.desc: Sleeping no longer restores health, resolve, or removes cards.

juggernaut.name: Juggernaut
juggernaut.desc: All fighters gain 1 Power at the end of their turn.

playing_for_keeps.name: Playing for Keeps
playing_for_keeps.desc: At the start of the game, gain a random Keepsake card.

land_of_plenty.name: Land of Plenty
land_of_plenty.desc: After every battle and negotiation, draft both a negotiation card and a battle card.

loyalty.name: Loyalty
loyalty.desc: Hired allies no longer leave your party.

mental_overload.name: Mental Overload
mental_overload.desc: You only discard Unplayable cards at the end of your turn. Affects both combat and negotiations.

multicard.name: Multicard
multicard.desc: Whenever you draft a card, add two additional copies of it to your deck.

mutator.name: Mutator
mutator.desc: When you upgrade a card, choose from two random cards instead.

negotiation_bundle.name: Negotiation Bundle
negotiation_bundle.desc: Draft 3 packs of negotiation cards to augment your starting deck, then remove 3 cards from your deck.

nesting_cards.name: Nesting Cards
nesting_cards.desc: All cards have Hatch 4 and transform into a random card when hatched.

on_your_toes.name: On Your Toes
on_your_toes.desc: At the end of each battle, remove 3 cards from your deck and draft 3 new ones.

parasitology.name: Parasitology
parasitology.desc: Start the run infected with bog parasites.

partner_in_crime.name: Partner In Crime
partner_in_crime.desc: Once per day, you can hire someone who loves you to help you on a quest.

perfect_shape.name: Perfect Shape
perfect_shape.desc: Gain 1 Power at the start of each battle.

perseverance.name: Perseverance
perseverance.desc: When you would die, instead heal to 20 health. Only works once.

pet_owner.name: Pet Owner
pet_owner.desc: You start the run with a random pet.

picky_battler.name: Picky Battler
picky_battler.desc: Draft a selection from a large grid of cards to augment your starting battle deck.

picky_negotiator.name: Picky Negotiator
picky_negotiator.desc: Draft a selection from a large grid of cards to augment your starting negotiation deck.

precision.name: Precision
precision.desc: Whenever you play a card add a copy of it to your discard pile. At the end of your turn, Expend any cards in your hand.

premium_quality.name: Premium Quality
premium_quality.desc: The first graft you install is immediately upgraded.

relatable.name: Relatable
relatable.desc: Everyone you meet for the first time will dislike you.

researcher.name: Researcher
researcher.desc: Gain 10 shills every time you use an item card with a charge.

resourceful.name: Resourceful
resourceful.desc: At the start of each battle, choose any number of cards in your hand and permanently replace them with random cards of the same or higher quality.

roll_with_it.name: Roll With It
roll_with_it.desc: You can no longer skip card drafts.

score_cards.name: Score Cards
score_cards.desc: At the start of the game, gain a random Score card.

socializer.name: Socializer
socializer.desc: Gain 1 maximum resolve whenever a new person loves you.

stamina.name: Stamina
stamina.desc: Fatigued starts 1 turn later than normal.

stamina_ii.name: Stamina II
stamina_ii.desc: Fatigued starts 2 turns later than normal.

starved.name: Starved
starved.desc: Battle and negotiation no longer offer card rewards.

swear_jar.name: Swear Jar
swear_jar.desc: Start your run with an additional 75 shills.

terror.name: Terror
terror.desc: Whenever you kill an enemy, increase the Panic of all their allies.

tool_box.name: Tool Box
tool_box.desc: Draft two item cards at the start of the game. They have 1 additional charge.

tough_constitution.name: Tough Constitution
tough_constitution.desc: Once per day, drink and eat without any repercussions.

unencumbered.name: Unencumbered
unencumbered.desc: Gain 1 additional graft slot of each type.

unnatural_growth.name: Unnatural Growth
unnatural_growth.desc: All cards require a random amount of experience to upgrade.

veteran.name: Veteran
veteran.desc: Draft a starting battle deck of 10 cards.
